content.text:
# Yarram Venkateswarareddy

Yerram reddy served as the Member of the Legislative Assembly for Tirupati constituency in Andhra Pradesh, India, between 2004 and 2014.
References
1)He joined ysrcp party in 2001
2)He have only 1 children named Vishnu vardhan reddy(btech at vit as per sources ) he is a cricket player for hyd team
3)He was married to manjula reddy in 2002
4)He started tirumala constructions in 2006 and with multiple re locations
